short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let vimium can run on the HNTP (new tab) page well. so you can use the keyboard all the time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: when this app convert to manifest-v3, it goes bad. plz go to https://github.com/wishrivers/VimiumTabpage/releases
DOWNLOAD:  https://github.com/wishrivers/VimiumTabpage/releases/download/v1.1/VimiumTabpage_v1.1.crx
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vimium is awesome, HNTP is awesome, too. but vimium cann't run on the HNTP tabpage. so, I merge them, let they works well. Finally, it looks like this:
https://github.com/wishrivers/VimiumTabpage/blob/master/snapshot/intro.webp

Detail: https://github.com/wishrivers/VimiumTabpage
Usage:
1. Ctrl+T or t: New Tabpage
2. press f: Link hits
3. press o: Vimium bar,  press T: Tab,  press b: Bookmark
